posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hail, my mates!

I was wondering today, I've been getting into a feel of playing my Henchmen builds, and would love to start with Valen Shadowbreath, but I don't have the portrait, which for me is kind of important. Is there a way of downloading it somewhere? Or maybe one of you guys can be so nice as to send it to me? I would also like Nathyrra's, Daelan Red Tiger's, Dorna's. I have Tomi's, Linu's, Sharwyn's, Xanos', and some others, even Lord Nasher and Fenthick Moss...

Thanks in advance!

posts.author: Mardus
posts.content: I just downloaded this: http://nwvault.ign.com/View.php?view=po ... il&id=5363 and I think it may have the portraits you need.
